record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 9:15 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate today, and if the Republican leader has nothing further, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 8:06 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, March 21, 2007, at 9:15 a.m.
